title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 8201.8 - Denial of access to records
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 8201.8 - Denial of access to records

State Regulations
(a) Denial of access to records shall be in
writing stating the reasons therefor and advising the requester of the right to
appeal to the appeals officer designated by the executive director. (b) If requested records are not provided
promptly, as required in section
8201.7
of this Part, such failure
shall also be deemed a denial of access. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
8201.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
